thread.title: commit Clifford Chattman featured on the TODAY show
thread.title_full: LSU commit Clifford Chattman featured on the TODAY show | NOLA.com

author: Amos Morale III, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: commit Clifford Chattman featured on the TODAY show
text:
LSU commit and McDonogh 35 defensive back Cliffford Chattman was featured on the TODAY show this morning.
The 6-foot-4 prospect has helped the Roneagles to a 4-0 record this season.
Chattman and his mother discussed his Hurricane Katrina experience and why football is important to him on the daily morning show.
Watch the segment below:
